title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-f - Order of commitment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 16-f - Order of commitment

State Regulations
C.P.L. Article 730
FORM 16-f
12/88
ORDER OF COMMITMENT
________ COURT OF ________
COUNTY OF ________
________x
PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, ORDER OF COMMITMENT
- against -
Indictment No. ________
________
Defendant. ________x

The above named defendant, under indictment
for or convicted of the felony of ________, in violation of ________; and
having been examined pursuant to court order by ________ psychiatric examiners, qualified in accordance with law; and examination reports thereon having made
to the court; and the District Attorney and counsel for the defendant having
been given copies of such examination reports; and the court having examined
such examination reports, copies of which are attached hereto, (Strike out one of the following two
paragraphs)
AND no motion for a hearing having been
made, AND a hearing having been held on the ________
day of ________ and the following persons having appeared ____________
____________
____________
____________
AND it appearing to my satisfaction that the
said defendant as a result of mental disease or defect lacks capacity to
understand the proceedings against (him) (her) or to assist in (his) (her) own
defense, AND it appearing further that the maximum term
of imprisonment for the highest class of felony charged in the indictment
against the defendant or for the highest class of felony of which the defendant
was convicted is ________ years and that two thirds of such authorized maximum
term of imprisonment is ________ years, ________ months, ________ days, NOW, on motion of ________, it is ORDERED that
the above named defendant is hereby adjudicated an incapacitated person and is
hereby committed to the custody of the Commissioner of (OMH) (OMRDD) for care
and treatment in an appropriate facility operated by the (OMH) (OMRDD) to be
designated by the appropriate Commissioner, for a period not to exceed one year
from the date of this order, and it is further
ORDERED that if the person in charge of the
facility in which the defendant is confined determines that the defendant is no
longer an incapacitated person, such person shall give notice in writing of
such determination to this court and to the District Attorney, and it is
further
ORDERED that the defendant, if (he) (she) be
in detention, be continued in detention at ________, pending designation of an
appropriate facility by the (OMH) (OMRDD), and upon notice by the appropriate

Commissioner of the designated facility, be delivered thereto by the (County

Sheriff) (Commissioner of Correction of the City of New York). Dated:________
_________
Judge or Justice
